menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: Menu 'Fitness' - This is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. It's a product for active and healthy individuals. It's an entirely new product with an optimal price and high quality

menu.title: Menu 'Vegan'
menu.descr: The 'Vegan Menu' is a careful selection of ingredients: it completely excludes animal-derived products, using almond, oat, coconut, or buckwheat milk instead. It provides the right amount of protein through tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium Menu,' we not only focus on beautiful packaging design but also ensure high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - have dinner like in restaurant!
